rukus.text: 26|160|Ruto no min mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|161|Doho ruto ga, kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
26|162|`Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|163|Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|164|Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, daredare ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|165|Anata gata wa sozo sa reta mono no naka otoko dake ni chikadzuki,
26|166|-nushi ga anata gata no tame ni tsukura reta haigusha o kaeriminai nodesu ka. Iya, anata gata wa tsumiwookasu-shadesu.'
26|167|Kare-ra wa (kotaete) itta. `Ikagen tomenainara, ruto yo, anata wa kanarazu tsuiho sa rerudeshou.'
26|168|Kare (ruto wa) itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni anata gata no okonai o imikiratte imasu.
26|169|Omo yo, watashi to watashinokazoku o, kare-ra no shogyo kara o sukui kudasai.'
26|170|Sorede ware wa, kare to kare no kazoku o subete sukutta.
26|171|Ato ni nokotta, rojo (ruto no tsuma) wa betsudeattaga.
26|172|Sore kara, ware wa soto no mono o horoboshita.
26|173|Ware wa,(-seki no) ame o kare-ra no ue ni fura seta. Keikoku sa rete ita-sha-tachi ni wa, saiyaku no amedeatta.
26|174|Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|175|Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaki jihibukaki okata de ara reru.
